_comment: FOMolt3D Mainnet Deployment Configuration — review ALL values before deploying

network._rpc_note: Use a paid RPC provider (Helius, Triton, QuickNode). Public mainnet RPCs are rate-limited and unreliable.

program._program_id_note: Same keypair as devnet — the program ID is deterministic from the keypair

authority._authority_note: Transfer program upgrade authority to this address after deployment. Use a multisig (e.g., Squads) for production.

game_parameters._pricing_note: Review bonding curve parameters carefully. These cannot be changed after round starts (only via config update between rounds).

fee_splits.protocol_fee_pct: 2% of each purchase (house edge, deducted before pot)
fee_splits.referral_bonus_pct: 10% of after-fee amount (paid from buyer cost, not pot)

wallets._protocol_wallet_note: Receives the 2% protocol fee from every key purchase. Use a dedicated wallet, not the deployer.

app._public_rpc_note: This is exposed to browsers. Use a separate public endpoint or the same paid RPC with rate limiting.

priority_fees._note: Dynamic strategy fetches recent prioritization fees. Fallback used when RPC estimate unavailable. Max caps overpayment.
